Package paintingcanvas.misc

Enum Anchor

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Anchor>
      • paintingcanvas.misc.Anchor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Anchor>
    public enum Anchor
extends java.lang.Enum<Anchor>
    The Anchor enum represents what point, relative to the center of an element, the element is draw about. All rotations are done around to this anchor point, and its treated as the "center" of the element.
